name: Hotel le Windsor Grande Plage Biarritz
description: Fully renovated in 2021, the environmentally-friendly Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is located on the beachfront, in the heart of Biarritz. It offers modern accommodation with sea views and free Wi-Fi access. A room service as well as a conciergerie service are provided. It has soundproofed and air-conditioned guest rooms. Each elegantly designed room has an en suite bathroom, flat-screen TV with satellite channels and views of the sea, the town or the courtyard. Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz offers two breakfast options. Guests can choose from a continental breakfast in the room or a buffet breakfast. The bistronomic restaurant, 'Chez Eugénie Biarritz', offers seafood and meals made with fresh and seasonal produce, cooked on site. A public car park is available 50 metres from the hotel, at an extra cost. Hôtel Le Windsor Biarritz is within easy access of the town’s many shops, covered market, the Aquarium, the Rocher de la Vierge and Bellevue Casino Congress Centre.

name: Novotel Deauville Plage
description: The Novotel Deauville Plage welcomes you a stone's throw from the beach. From family rooms to suites with a sea view, our modular accommodation caters to all needs. Enjoy our panoramic restaurant with its own terrace. There is another terrace located on the ground floor where you can share a drink or an assortment of sushi from the bar. Three meeting rooms are available for hosting your seminars.accorhotels.com

name: Radisson Blu Hotel, Nice
description: Featuring a private beach and free Wi-Fi, Radisson Blu Hotel Nice is situated in Nice and offers modern accommodation. It features panoramic sea views and 4-star rooms. There are a variety of facilities available to guests of Hotel Radisson Blu Nice, including express check-in/check-out, free shuttle service and car hire. Staff are available 24/7 and can book tours and tickets. It also has a gym with a swimming pool. The rooms at Radisson Blu are air-conditioned and include converters/voltage adaptors, an in-room safe and a mini bar. Hot drinks can be brewed with the available tea and coffee supplies, and savoured in the comfort of the room's living area. During their stay at Radisson Blu Hotel, guests can dine at Calade rooftop restaurant and relax with a drink at Lobby Bar 223. A buffet breakfast is served daily. Radisson Nice provides on-site parking for guests with a car. Promenade des Anglais is a short drive away.Revato

name: Novotel Suites Nice Airport
description: 5 mins from the Mediterranean and NICE airport, recharge your batteries at Novotel Suites Nice Airport. Family stays, holidays for 2 or business trips: the 4-star hotel welcomes you to comfortable suites, convertible to work spaces for business meetings. Enjoy a gourmet break in our boutique in a friendly setting or in your room. Relax by the pool or stroll Promenade des Anglais.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel du Petit Palais
description: Located in Nice, Hotel Le Petit Palais welcomes you in a green and elegant historic district. Le Petit Palais features 25 air-conditioned rooms with a refined decor. Each is fitted with modern equipment and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms rooms offer views of the sea or of Nice Old Town. The hotel is 10 minutes' walk from the Chagall Museum and close to the Matisse Museum and the Roman archaeological site. During your stay, enjoy the many attractions of Nice. You can go to the beach and shop in the city centre.

name: Sheraton Nice Airport
description: The superb location of the Sheraton Nice Airport hotel makes it the natural hub between the airport, Nice city center and the beach. Enjoy your stay in our fully soundproofed designer rooms and suites offering all the modern comforts. Let yourself be tempted by the originality of our restaurant menu and appreciate the quiet tranquility of its garden. Enjoy a moment of relaxation and calm beside the rooftop pool whilst having a snack and a cocktail, or whilst gazing out across the unique and amazingly serene view of the airfield with the Mediterranean Sea sparkling in the background. Complete your day with a great workout at our fitness center followed by some evening bites at our Club Lounge. The Sheraton Nice Airport offers 7 state-of-the-art meeting rooms to host your conference, wedding or social events with easy, convenient and quick connections direct to Nice city center just a few minutes away. Sheraton Nice Airport, your perfect combination for business and leisure.Marriott

name: Hôtel Vacances Bleues Le Royal
description: Hôtel Le Royal Promenade des Anglais is located on the famous Promenade des Anglais. Nice Airport is just 5.2 km away, while Nice Old Town is only a 2-minute drive. The property is set in a historic building and offers air-conditioned rooms and a terrace bar overlooking the sea. Each classically decorated and spacious room is equipped with a TV and a private bathroom. A breakfast buffet is served daily and the restaurant at Hôtel Le Royal Promenade des Anglais serves traditional and regional French cuisine. Meals can be enjoyed on one of the hotel's terraces. Free WiFi, discounted taxi rates, tickets and excursions are proposed at the 24-hour reception.

name: Harmonice
address: 247 Route de la Lauvette, 06340 Drap, Alpes-Maritimes
description: No description found

name: Hôtel La Fiancée du Pirate
address: 8, boulevard de la Corne d'Or, 06230 Villefranche-sur-Mer, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Located between Nice and Monaco, Hotel La Fiancée du Pirate overlooks the Villefranche Sur Mer bay and is opposite Saint Jean Cap Ferrat peninsula. It offers a panoramic sea view. Rooms are comfortable, with queen or king-size beds. Some rooms enjoy a sea view while others have a terrace or garden. A buffet breakfast is served daily on the terrace facing the sea. Guests can relax by the hotel swimming pool where sun lounges and towels are offered. The Hôtel La Fiancée du Pirate is an ideal base for exploring the nearby coastal towns of the French Riviera including Eze, St Paul de Vence, Nice, Antibes and Juan les Pins.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Nice
address: 59 Promenade des Anglais, Entrée Rue Honorée Sauvan, 06000 Nice
description: Slow your pace and feel the dazzling vibe of the French Riviera at the AC Hotel Nice. Our 4-Star family-friendly hotel is ideally located a few steps away from the iconic Promenade des Anglais, the beautiful beaches, the city’s old town and most famous attractions. Elegance, sophistication and convivial spirit will guarantee a memorable guest experience. At the AC Hotel Nice, you will unwind in our modern rooms with sleek furnishings, specially crafted for maximum comfort and function. Discover the incredible 600 square meter rooftop, entirely landscaped, with its pool perched on the 8th floor, offering amazing views of Nice! On the horizon, the turquoise water of the “Grande Bleue” glistens. From sunrise to sunset, laze in the shade of an umbrella, enjoy exquisitely prepared tapas for a relaxing lunch in the sun, or raise a toast with a Sparkling Sangria. During the hot hours of the day, there’s nothing better than diving into the refreshing pool, with a fresh lemonade waiting at your table!Marriott

name: Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Mediterranee
description: Set on the Promenade des Anglais, Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée is an art-deco style hotel featuring an on-site casino, an indoor and outdoor swimming pool, a hammam and a sauna. The terrace offers panoramic views of the Baie des Anges. Free WiFi, a minibar, tea and coffee making facilities and a flat-screen TV are provided in the air-conditioned guest rooms and suites. Most have a furnished terrace with views of the sea or of the town. Regional cuisine and Mediterranean dishes are served in the hotel's restaurant, Le 3e. You can enjoy drinks in the Lounge Bar Le 3e at Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée. The fitness centre at the Hyatt Regency Nice Palais de la Méditerranée has cardio-training gym equipment. Nice Train Station is a 5-minute walk, while Nice-Cote d’Azur Airport is just 6 km away. This hotel is eco-certified by Green Globe.

name: Le Méridien Nice
description: Discover a modern design hotel in Nice and unlock the timeless elegance of the South of France. Offering a chic French Riviera beachfront hotel setting, Le Meridien Nice is the ideal place to unwind, indulge and relax in the alluring Cote d Azur. Located at the iconic, No 1. Promenade des Anglais, just steps away from Nice Old Town, this family friendly hotel invites guests to take in everything the destination has to offer. Be captivated by exhilarating views of the Mediterranean Sea from a selection of the 318 luxury guest rooms, including 15 suites. Reimagined to evoke the glamorous 1960s, each curated space reflects regional and cosmopolitan flair. Delight in local flavours and creative cocktails at Latitude Bar. Head to the rooftop with its panoramic Baie des Anges views, experience elevated dining at La Terrasse or awaken the senses with a dip in the outdoor heated pool.Marriott

name: Hôtel La Pérouse Nice Baie des Anges - Recently fully renovated
description: The Hotel La Pérouse Nice has completed a full refurbishment program in 2023 and will be brand-new for your 2023 stays. This luxury, 4-star boutique hotel is located high above the Promenade des Anglais nestled into the Colline du Château. It is 250 metres from both Cours Saleya and the harbour, and offers a heated outdoor swimming pool and a sun terrace with sea views. A minibar, free Wi-Fi access and wired internet are provided in each air-conditioned room. Some rooms feature a private balcony where guests can enjoy views of the sea and have breakfast. All of the rooms have an Italian marble bathroom and an elegant Mediterranean décor. Enjoy Provencal cuisine on the terrace, in the shade of the lemon trees. A buffet breakfast, including hot and cold dishes, local and organic products is prepared every morning at Hôtel La Pérouse. The 24-hour reception offers a concierge services and a valet service is available from 07:00 to 23:00. Guests can exercise in the on-site fitness centre before enjoying a session in the sauna, hot tub or solarium. Nice Opera House is just an 8-minute walk from the hotel and Nice-Ville Train Station is 2.3 km away. The famous Flower Market and Old Town are a few steps away, while Nice Airport is 7 km away.

name: Intercontinental Marseille - Hotel Dieu, An IHG Hotel
description: The epitome of luxury, the InterContinental Marseille-Hotel Dieu is located in Marseille’s historic Panier district. You can enjoy a pastis aperitif on the terrace with views of Notre Dame de la Garde Basilica before dining on Mediterranean dishes in the Michelin-starred Alcyone restaurant. Work out in the fitness room, swim in the indoor pool, or unwind with a treatment in the chic SPA by Clarins. Five minutes’ walk away, boats line the quay of the Vieux-Port, in the heart of the city.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Novotel Marseille Vieux Port
description: Get away from it all at the Novotel Marseille Vieux-Port hotel situated in the heart of Marseilles. Relax in the hotel's comfortable rooms during a family vacation, a romantic weekend or a business trip. The six meeting rooms can accommodate your conferen ces, then you can relax in the outdoor pool or the whirlpool bath. Enjoy the friendly atmosphere and contemporary decor of the restaurant overlooking the Old Port and discover the calanques of Marseilles. Enjoy the Mediterranean way of life at Novotelaccorhotels.com

name: Château Beaupin Chambres et Suites By Les Collectionneurs
description: Château Beaupin chambres et suites is located in Marseille, near the beach. This listed building dates from 19th century. The hotel features a swimming pool, bar-restaurant and certain rooms have a private gardens, see view or balcony. Free WiFi is available. All rooms have a flat-screen TV, air condition, coffee making facilitities and a hairdryer. Bed linen, towels, pool towels and toiletries are provided. The area is popular for its beaches, hiking along the coastline, windsurfing, diving and golf. Free open parking is available onsite and is monitored by video surveillance. The Old Port is a 15-minute drive away. Marseille Provence Airport is 33 km away. Couples particularly like the location — they rated it 8.7 for a two-person trip.

name: Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed
description: Situated just 500 metres from Les Terrasses du Port shopping centre in Marseille, Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed boasts sea views as well as free access to a fitness area, indoor pool and sun terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the bar or a meal in the La Table restaurant. Free WiFi is provided. Rooms feature air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and hairdryer. The suites have a seating area to relax in after a busy day. Access to the upper floors and rooms is secure and by magnetic access card only. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also boasts a food truck, a body care bar and tandem bicycles. Velodrome Stadium is 5 km from Golden Tulip Marseille Euromed. Gare Maritime is 1 km from the property while the nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 25 km away. Public parking is available nearby and guests can buy a parking package at the reception.

name: La Calanq'Aise
description: Set 4.7 km from Orange Velodrome Stadium, La Calanq'Aise offers a garden, and accommodation with a terrace and free WiFi. There is a seating and a dining area in all units. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. A outdoor play equipment is also available for guests at La Calanq'Aise. Rond-Point du Prado Metro Station is 4.9 km from the accommodation, while Marseille Chanot Exhibition and Convention Centre is 5.3 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Provence Airport, 31 km from La Calanq'Aise.

name: Villa Valflor chambres d'hôtes et appartements
description: Set in a 19th-century country house, this air-conditioned B&B offers a Moroccan-style patio in the garden. La Pointe Rouge Beach is 100 metres away and free Wi-Fi access is provided. A flat-screen TV features in the individually decorated guest rooms and the apartment. Some of the rooms offer views of the garden or the sea, and the en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is prepared every morning at Villa Valflor chambres d'hôtes et appartements. The apartment’s kitchenette also includes a washing machine, dishwasher and microwave. Located 6 km from the centre of Marseille, this bed and breakfast is a 10-minute walk from Parc Borely Golf Club. Free private parking is available on site and a shuttle service can be arranged at an extra cost.

name: ibis Styles Ajaccio Napoleon
description: The ibis Styles Ajaccio Napoléon is a place where creativity, style, hospitality and a taste for sharing meet. Discover the hotel's "Histo'Art" story as told by its team, while taking in the warm and contemporary setting. Enjoy the hotel rooftop with a panoramic view of downtown Ajaccio. The hotel has a full range of services that includes a breakfast buffet and secure parking, all with an original twist.accorhotels.com

name: Best Western Plus Ajaccio Amiraute
description: The Best Western Plus® Ajaccio Amiraute is ideally located close to the Congress Center, the harbour, the city center, and the airport. With its exceptional view over the sea, this property, will offer you all of the best, three star services: solarium terrace, heated swimming-pool (from March until November), private covered garage, Wi-Fi access, conference hall, business corner, office, restaurant, front desk and snacks 24 hours. We invite you to visit Ajaccio, Bonaparte House, Imperial Chapel, Fesch Museum, the wonderful Gulf of Ajaccio, with more than 20 kilometers of white fine sand, and Filitosa, Piana, Scandola, Bonifacio and Porto-Vecchio.bestwestern.com

name: Hôtel Le Week end
description: Offering a seasonal outdoor pool and sun terrace, Hôtel Le Week end is situated in Ajaccio in the Corsica Region. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and has a flat-screen TV with cable channels. You will find a coffee machine in the rooms. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and free toiletries. Hôtel Le Week end features free WiFi throughout the property. You will find concierge service at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. Sanguinaires Islands is 3.4 km from Hôtel Le Week end, while Parata Tower is 3.6 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ajaccio – Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 13 km from Hôtel Le Week end.

name: Hôtel Cala di Sole
address: 1, Route Des Sanguinaires Ajaccio, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: The Cala di Sole is located on the seafront in a calm area. It offers views of the Gulf of Ajaccio, a private beach and a swimming pool. Private parking with video surveillance is free on site. Cala di Sole has air-conditioned guest rooms. They include en suite facilities, a TV and a sea view. Some have a terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available. A buffet breakfast is served daily and guests can have breakfast served in their room for a supplement. Snacks are also available on request. Free parking for cars and motorcycles is provided, and the area offers activities such as diving and jet-skiing. Near the Cala di Sole, guests can enjoy the Sanguinaires Islands and Napoleon’s birth place. During low season, from the 1st of November to the 31st of December, special policies are applied during the stay as self check-in and cleaning.

name: Hôtel Dolce Vita
address: 51 Route Des Iles Sanguinaires, 20000 Ajaccio, Corsica
description: This pet-friendly hotel is located in Ajaccio and features a private beach. It also offers free Wi-Fi, a diving centre and an outdoor pool. Guests can soak up the outdoors on the terrace or enjoy a beverage at the bar. Guests can also enjoy free private parking on site. The rooms are air conditioned and include tea and coffee making facilities, a flat-screen TV and a private terrace. They all have an in-room closet, heating and an in-room safe. The hotel's restaurant serves local, European and Mediterranean cuisine and overlooks the water. Room service is also available during certain times. Guests can hire a jet ski and visit the surrounding area from the shoreline. The friendly staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Ajaccio.Revato

name: Radisson Blu Resort & Spa, Ajaccio Bay
description: Just 100 metres from Agosta Beach, this hotel features a spa with hammam and hot tub, a terrace and a garden with a heated, outdoor pool with a poolside bar. It proposes air-conditioned rooms and car rental. Free Wi-Fi is available in each en suite room. All rooms feature extras long beds, a balcony and ironing facilities. Breakfast is provided in the form of a buffet each morning. For other meals you can try regional food in the restaurant while enjoying views of Ajaccio Bay. Afterwards you can relax in the hotel bar. Located 5 km from Porticcio and its beach, the Radisson Blu Resort & Spa is 19 km from Ajaccio town centre. Services include a laundry, business centre and organisation of excursions.

name: Hôtel Le Bastia
description: This comfortable hotel in Bastia offers complimentary wireless internet, as well as an express check-in and check-out feature and a 24-hour reception. It is ideally positioned for those wanting to discover the area's attractions. This 3-star hotel offers room service, a safe and luggage storage. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to provide assistance. The rooms are air conditioned and include a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and tea and coffee making facilities. They all have heating, an in-room safe and an in-room closet. Guests can sit down to breakfast every morning at Adonis Hotel Le Bastia. The hotel is close to Bastia Train Station, making it easy for guests to discover Bastia and its surrounding areas. Guests can also visit Bastia Cathedral.Revato

name: Hotel Port Toga
address: Rond Point DE Toga, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Hotel Port Toga is located in Bastia, just a 2-minute walk from Port de Toga. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. The guest rooms and suites feature a flat-screen TV, desk and security deposit box. The private bathrooms have either a bath or shower. The suites also offer a balcony. A buffet breakfast is available every morning serving locally sourced produce. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Saint-Florent is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Poretta Airport, 21 km from Hotel Port Toga.

name: Hôtel Des Gouverneurs
address: 3 Bis Rue Des Turquines, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Featuring an indoor pool and panoramic sea views from the terrace, Hôtel Des Gouverneurs is a seafront property in the pedestrianised citadel area of Bastia, just 90 metres from Bastia Museum, 2 minutes' walk from the Old Port and 5 minutes' walk from the city centre. Guests can relax in the bar. There is free WiFi throughout the property. The air-conditioned rooms and suites feature a flat-screen TV, an electric kettle, and a private bathroom, hairdryer and free toiletries. The suites have a seating area and a sea view. A buffet or continental breakfast is served every morning at Hôtel Des Gouverneurs. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including snorkeling and windsurfing. Paid public parking can be found within 200 metres of the property. L’Île-Rousse is 70 km from Hôtel Des Gouverneurs, while Saint-Florent is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, a 30-minute drive from Hôtel Des Gouverneurs.

name: Best Western Premier Santa Maria
address: Route du Port BP 107, 20220 L'Île-Rousse, Corsica
description: The Best Western Premier Santa Maria is ideally situated opposite the red islands of Ile Rousse, right on the water's edge, with direct access to its own private beach. We are the ideal place for a dream holiday, with comfort of a 3-Star hotel, offering terraces and rooms with a sea view. Best Western Premier Santa Maria definitely has the best of both worlds with its beachside location and close access to the activities and amenities Ile Rousse has to offer. Our hotel provides an extensive breakfast buffet. All rooms are air-conditioned, with a balcony or patio and equipped to a good standard with satellite television, telephone, en-suite bathrooms (bath or shower), hairdryer, mini-bar, safe, and Wi-Fi access on garden/park car side on the ground floor, standard room on the first floor park car side or on the ground floor garden side, and many rooms are on sea side (ground floor or first and second floor). Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Pietracap
address: 20 Route de San Martino, 20200 San-Martino-di-Lota, Corsica
description: This hotel is located in Pietranera, a small town with a pebble beach, 3 km from Bastia. Set within a garden with an olive grove, the hotel faces Elba Island and offers modern rooms and free parking. Rooms at Pietracap offer large windows that lead onto a private balcony with views of the sea or the 1-hectare park. Each is air-conditioned and has an LCD TV and a minibar. Guests can enjoy French pastries and homemade jams in the breakfast room every morning. On sunny days, the terrace provides a nice spot to relax and admire the orange and olive trees. Additional facilities include Wi-Fi and a lounge where a local artist’s work is displayed. Bastia ferry port is a 10-minute drive away and provides access to Toulon, Marseille and Nice.

name: Hotel Costa Salina
description: Located in Porto Vecchio with a panoramic view of the sea, Hotel Costa Salina offers an outdoor swimming pool, a hot tub and a sun terrace. With a view of either the sea or the Mediterranean garden or the salt marshes and the pool, the air-conditioned rooms have a balcony or a patio. The spacious guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV and a minibar at Hotel Costa Salina. Each modern room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower and a toilet. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. A buffet breakfast can be served in the dining room with views of the swimming pool. At the Costa Salina, a continental breakfast can be taken on your private balcony. From April 20th to 15 September, guests can enjoy a drink in the poolside bar and a meal at the restaurant, which serves meals featuring local produce. Hammam and massages are available upon prior request. With free private parking on site, the hotel is 23 km from Figari-Sud Corse Airport. The historic centre is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Maria Die
description: No description found

name: Hotel Villa Joséphine
description: Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine has a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and bar in LʼÎle-Rousse. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service and a tour desk. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental or a gluten-free breakfast. At Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine you will find a restaurant serving French, Mediterranean and local cuisine. Vegetarian, vegan and gluten-free options can also be requested. Guests at the hotel will be able to enjoy activities in and around LʼÎle-Rousse, like hiking. Popular points of interest near Hôtel Restaurant Villa Joséphine include Napoleon Beach, Nautique Beach and Caruchettu Beach. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 20 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Madame Mere
address: Route de Bastia, BP 56, 20217 Saint-Florent, Corsica
description: Located a 5-minute walk from the beach, Hotel Madame Mere offers an outdoor swimming pool, a local restaurant and a bar which serves cocktails. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Madame Mere offer a view of the mountains or the sea. It includes a flat-screen TV, a telephone and a bathroom with a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is provided. A continental breakfast is provided every morning. After breakfast, you can rest by the pool, on the furnished terrace. Saint-Florent’s Harbour is 1 km away. Activities nearby are hiking, paragliding and sailing. It is situated 35 km from Bastia-Poretta Airport and 25 km from the city of Bastia. WiFi is available in public areas (only) and is free of charge.

name: Bartaccia Hotel
address: 12 Quartier Bartaccia - Route De La Corniche, 20110 Propriano, Corsica
description: Facing Valinco Gulf, Hotel Bartaccia is located in a 3-hectare flowered park in Propriano. It features a seasonal hot tub and 2 swimming pools, one of them heated. The modern guest rooms offer a private terrace or balcony with views of the garden or sea. Each room has a flat-screen TV with cable channels, mini-fridge and safety deposit box. Each room has a private bathroom that is fitted with a walk-in shower. Shops and activities can be found in Propriano and Hotel Bartaccia's staff can provide guests with advice on where to go. The beach of fine sand and the turquoise waters of the Mediterranean Sea are situated just 200 metres from the hotel.

name: Hotel Restaurant La Corniche
description: Situated at the entrance of Cap corse, Hôtel de la Corniche is in the village of San-Martino-di-Lota. The property features an outdoor swimming pool and an on-site restaurant features a terrace with far-reaching views of the valley and sea. Free WiFi is available. The guest rooms at Hôtel de la Corniche all have a flat-screen TV. Each room includes a private bathroom with bath and free toiletries. Some rooms also have a terrace and sea views. A buffet breakfast is available every morning and can be taken on the terrace. Local Corsican dishes are served in the restaurant. Additional local restaurants can be found in the village, a 2-minute walk away. Hôtel de la Corniche is 8 km from Bastia Port. Miomo Beach is a 15-minute drive away and Patrimonio vineyard is 40 minutes by car. Free private parking is provided.

name: Hotel Genovese
address: Quartier De La Citadelle Haute Ville, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: Located on the southern coast of Corsica in Bonifacio, Hotel Spa Genovese has a cliff top position with panoramic views. It has an outdoor pool with a sun terrace and lounge chairs. Guests can dine in the onsite restaurant, and in the summer meals are served on the poolside. WiFi is available throughout the property. Renovated in 2018, rooms are situated in the Genovese’s main property, while the suites are in a separate port-side building. Each guest room has a modern décor with air-conditioning and satellite TV. Breakfast is served daily at Hotel Spa Genovese. The restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and specialises in Mediterranean fish and pasta dishes. Hotel Spa Genovese provides a 24-hour reception, where guided boat tours can be arranged. It offers free private parking, 20 km from the Figari-Sud Corse Airport.

name: Golden Tulip Porto Vecchio
description: Located in Porto-Vecchio, 1.3 km from Cala Verde Beach, Golden Tulip Porto-Vecchio provides accommodation with a fitness centre, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. Every room comes with a balcony with views of the sea. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. All units include a wardrobe. Continental and American breakfast options are available daily at Golden Tulip Porto-Vecchio. The accommodation offers 4-star accommodation with a sauna. Marina di Fiori Beach is 2.4 km from Golden Tulip Porto-Vecchio, while Crique de la Marina di Fiori is 2.8 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Restaurant San Lucianu
description: Located in Moriani-Plage with direct access to the sea, the recently renovated Hotel Restaurant San Lucianu offers a restaurant and terrace, free private parking, a seasonal outdoor swimming pool and a bar. With a 3-hectare park, this 3-star hotel offers rooms with air conditioning, free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom. All rooms include a wardrobe and a flat-screen TV. The property provides concierge and luggage storage services. Hotel Restaurant San Lucianu serves a buffet breakfast as well as dinner and lunch. You can play table tennis and tennis on site, as well as rent bicycles. The nearest airport is Bastia-Poretta Airport, 22 km away.

name: Hôtel Castell'Verde
address: Baie de Santa Giulia CS 20101, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Surrounded by a garden and located 300 metres from Santa Giulia Bay, Hôtel Castell'Verde offers an outdoor heated pool, tennis court and a restaurant with panoramic views of the sea. Each air-conditioned room has a simple décor and a terrace with sea or garden views. They are equipped with flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The restaurant offers a buffet breakfast that is served on the terrace, from here guests can enjoy the panoramic views. Other services provided at the Hôtel Castell'Verde are free private parking and 24-front desk with free Wi-Fi access. Guests are also invited to relax in the pine tree garden. Activities in the nearby area include canoeing, snorkelling and hiking. Castell'Verde is 6 km from Porto-Vecchio City Centre and 19 km from Bonifacio.

name: Hotel Kasano
description: Set in Calvi, 400 metres from Roncu Beach, KASANO & Spa features views of the sea. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property features an outdoor pool, fitness centre, sauna and bar. At the hotel all rooms come with air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. The units feature a safety deposit box. A buffet, continental or Full English/Irish breakfast is available every morning at the property. Pinède Beach is less than 1 km from KASANO & Spa, while Alga Beach is 2.9 km away. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Capo Rosso
description: Hôtel Capo Rosso is located in Piana, just 8 km from the beach and 11 km from Porto. It offers a heated outdoor swimming pool and a restaurant with panoramic views of Scandola Gulf. The rooms at Hôtel Capo Rosso feature a private balcony or terrace with sea views. Each one is air conditioned and has an en suite bathroom, which is complete with bathrobes and slippers. There are over 60 products available for breakfast including Corsican specialities and homemade cakes. You can also choose to have a drink on the terrace before sampling regional cuisine in the restaurant. Free Wi-Fi access and free private parking are just some of the other facilities available at this hotel. The 24-hour reception can tell you about the Calanche de Piana.

name: Résidence Roc e Mare
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, kitchenware and utensils, and a crib.Expedia

name: A Santa Trinita
description: Situated in Bonifacio, a 5-minute walk from Former Chapel of the Trinity, A Santa Trinita is set amongst 4 hectares and features barbecue facilities, a garden and a terrace, as well as free WiFi. The property is set 4.1 km from Bonifacio Port and 13 km from Lavezzi Islands. The property offers chalets and villas. All units come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Some units come with a kitchen including an oven, dishwasher and washing machine. The bathroom is fitted with a shower. Bed linen and towels are provided. An outdoor pool is also featured. You can play table tennis at A Santa Trinita. Donkeys, hens and ducks live near the property. King Aragon Steps is 3.6 km from the accommodation. Figari-Sud Corse Airport is 10 km away.

name: Hotel Castel d'Orcino
address: Baie de la Liscia, 20111 Calcatoggio, Corsica
description: Hotel Castel d’Orcino is set on the southern Corsican coast, overlooking the Mediterranean sea, 800 metres from Calcatoggio beach. It provides peaceful accommodation with 2 swimming pools. The spacious guest rooms feature air conditioning, free Wi-Fi internet access and a patio or balcony. Castel d’Orcino offers a daily buffet breakfast which can be served in the breakfast room or in the guest rooms. Free private parking is available for guests exploring the surrounding countryside and national parks by car. The town of Ajaccio, with its port and rail connections, is 20 km away. Campo dell’Oro Airport is • 25 km from the hotel.

name: Hotel Les Hauts de Porto-Vecchio
address: Hameau de la Trinité de Porto Vecchio, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Hôtel le Subrini
address: Place de la Marine, 20150 Porto, Corsica
description: Hôtel le Subrini offers a seasonal outdoor pool a 4-minute walk away in another property. It is located on the west coast of Corsica, 500 metres from the beach and has views of Porto Genoese Tower. Each air-conditioned guest room has a sea view and is equipped with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and free Wi-Fi access. All of the modern rooms have a spacious bathroom including a hairdryer. Guests of Hôtel le Subrini benefit from reduced rates for boat excursions around the UNESCO heritage site of Scandola Nature Reserve, the Calanques de Piana and Girolata village. Free private parking is available on site at Hôtel le Subrini and there is a garage for motorbikes. The harbour is 300 metres away and boat trips can be arranged.

name: Hotel Corsica
description: Hotel Corsica offers panoramic view of Calvi bay, set in the Corsican hills. It has an outdoor heated pool, sunbathing terrace Each of the Hotel Corsica’s air-conditioned guest rooms has a private bathroom with amenities, satellite TV and a private balcony. Free WiFi is available. For no extra fee, guests of Hotel Corsica can relax in the spa area which includes a hammam, a sauna, a hot tub and a fitness room. For a fee, massages and other treatments using Corsican products can be booked. A full buffet breakfast is available in the mornings and lunch can be enjoyed by the Hotel Corsica’s swimming pool. Room service options are also available. The shuttle to the Calvi airport and train station is free and the shuttle to the city centre and the beach is possible provided the purchase of a package for € 20.00 per day and per room.

name: Les Appartements du Port
description: Les Appartements du Port offers ApartHotel accommodation overlooking the harbour in Bonifacio on Corsica’s southern coast. The apartments come with air conditioning and free WiFi is available in public areas. Apartments at Les Appartements du Port are equipped with cable TV, a telephone and private bathroom. The apartments have views of the harbour or the courtyard. Bonifacio's walled city is only 850 metres away. Les Appartements du Port is 18 km from Figari Sud-Corse Airport and 25 km from Porto-Vecchio. Guests have access to free private parking 150 metres from the property.

name: Hotel Revellata
description: Hotel Revellata is located in the Corsican town of Calvi, 450 metres from the harbour and 100 metres from Ronco Beach. It has an outdoor heated pool, a gym, and a spa with a hot tub, sauna and indoor lap pool. Free WiFi is available throughout and free secure private parking is available onsite. Each guest room at the Revellata features air-conditioning, a TV and a private bathroom. Some of the rooms have a private balcony. Guests of the Revellata Hotel can relax with a drink in the bar. A buffet breakfast is served daily for a supplement. Massages are available upon reservation and for an extra charge. The Hotel Revellata is situated 1 km from Calvi Beach and the Cathedral. The Torra di Calvi are just 500 metres away and guests can enjoy tennis and water sports nearby.

name: Hôtel Abbartello
description: Set in the south west of Corsica, this seafront hotel provides direct access to Olmeto beach. Guests can have breakfast on their private balconies or on the bar’s panoramic terrace. The bright rooms at the Hôtel Abbartello are air conditioned and equipped with a TV and a minibar. They offer beautiful views of the sea. The private bathrooms feature a shower and a hairdryer. The hotel is surrounded by a garden. The Abbartello’s restaurant serves typical Mediterranean cuisine. Meals are served on the panoramic terrace overlooking the Gulf of Valinco. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and free WiFi access is available in the entire Hotel Abbartello. Guests can rent a boat 5 km away, or a bicycle 10 km away. Abbartello hotel is a 10-minute drive from Propriano, 48 km from Ajaccio and 66 km from Figari Sud-Corse Airport. Free private parking is possible on site.

name: Hôtel Version Maquis Santa Manza
description: Hôtel Version Maquis is located in the Bonifacio country side, overlooking the Santa Manza Bay. The property offers an outdoor pool, a free shuttle to the beach, a garden and free Wi-Fi. All rooms feature contemporary decor, a terrace with sea views, a flat-screen TV, a desk and a mini bar. The private bathrooms are fully equipped and come with free toiletries. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning and the hotel has an onsite bar. Restaurants can be found 6 km away. The property is 7 km from Bonifacio, 20 km from Porto-Vecchio and 20 km from Figari. Free parking is possible on site. The Sperone Golf Course can be found 7 km away.

name: La Villa Calvi
address: Chemin de Notre Dame de la Serra, 20260 Calvi, Corsica
description: This 5-star hotel is set a 5-minute drive from the centre of Calvi, in the North West of Corsica. It offers 5 different swimming pools, a tennis court, a fitness centre and a variety of beauty treatments. Each spacious room has a simple, elegant décor and includes a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, an iPod docking station and a minibar. A bathrobe, slippers, a hairdryer and free toiletries are provided in each private bathroom. La Table by La Villa offers Mediterranean-inspired cuisine featuring locally-caught fish and other local produce. There is also the Pool Bar or the more intimate Jo’s Bar for snacks and drinks. Guests have access to the restaurant which has a private beach. Sunbeds are reserved for guests. Calvi beach is a 15-minute walk away. Free WiFi is available and there is free private parking on site.

name: Alivi
description: Located in Bastia, overlooking a charming pebble beach, the Alivi hotel welcomes you to a world of quietness and relaxation. Choose among 37 air-conditioned rooms which all come with a terrace overlooking the sea. The hotel also boasts a swimming pool surrounded by lush gardens in which to enjoy unforgettable moments. Gourmets will gather at the Archipel restaurants serving sunny flavours in a cosy atmosphere. Enjoy lunch or dinner with a breathtaking view of the Tuscan islands.

name: A'mare Corsica - Seaside Resort
address: Route De La Corniche, 20110 Propriano, Corsica
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 26 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring minibars and espresso makers. Your Select Comfort bed comes with premium bedding. Flat-screen televisions with satellite programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Bathrooms have designer toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Dip into one of the 2 spa tubs or enjoy other recreational amenities including a sauna and a fitness center. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and a fireplace in the lobby. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the complimentary beach shuttle. Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff. Planning an event in Propriano? This hotel has 700 square feet (65 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and a meeting room. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Property Location With a stay at Miramar Corsica in Propriano, you'll be on the waterfront, just a 3-minute walk from Southern Corsica Beaches and a 2-minute drive from Les Bains de Baracci. This 5-star hotel is 2.2 mi (3.5 km) from Plage de Capu Laurosu and 4.9 mi (7.9 km) from Portigliolo Beach. Dining Grab a bite to eat at Le Deck Lounge, a poolside bar/lounge which features a pool view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the poolside bar. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Renovations The property is closed between September 19 and May 25. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.20 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 32 for adults and EUR 25 for children Pet fee: EUR 35 per pet, per day Service animals are exempt from fees Rollaway bed fee: EUR 75.0 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change.
