This property doesn't offer after-hours check-in. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 11:30 AM Pets Pets allowed Pet max weight (per pet) in kg is 4 Pet max weight (per pet) in lb is 8 Maximum number of pets per room 1 Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions Pets cannot be left unattended General instructions No elevators Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Social distancing measures are in place Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measures Professional property host/managerViajes Exito Hotels

name: Hôtel Restaurant La Caravelle
description: Nestled in the charming little seaside town of Solenzara located on the eastern coast of the island, 100 km south of Bastia and 35 km north of Porto-Vecchio, the hotel La Caravelle is a small charming three-star hotel tastefully decorated, completely renovated, located 600 meters from the beach with direct access on foot. With air conditioning and double glazing, our hotel will guarantee you a peaceful and pleasant stay, with the promise of peaceful nights. Our restaurant offers refined cuisine in a pleasant and warm setting. The Caravelle reinvents itself: You can now relax in the greatest comfort around our new heated swimming pool and its cocktail bar with snacking service and pancake and waffle tasting for the little hungry. All our rooms have been renovated to optimize your comfort, as well as the creation of a prestige room with sea view.

name: Résidence U Pirellu
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as a dishwasher and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, laundry facilities, a hair dryer, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Résidence Casarina
address: Route De Maora Golfe De Santa Manza, 20169 Bonifacio, Corsica
description: No description found

name: Residence & Hotel Aria Marina
description: No description found

name: Résidence Chiar' DI Luna
description: No description found

name: Hotel & Spa Des Pecheurs
description: Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs is located on the island of Cavallo, between Corsica and Sardinia. The elegant hotel offers a swimming pool in its garden, a spa centre and a French and Italian restaurant. The air-conditioned rooms at Hotel & SPA des Pecheurs have a view of the sea or the garden. Guests can relax in the seating area, watching TV or using the free WiFi access. The continental breakfast is included and served in the dining room, or it can be brought to your room. The elegant hotel’s bar features a terrace that provides direct access to the private beach. Other activities include a tennis court, concierge service and diving activities. Massages are available at an additional cost. The hotel is located 8 km from the coast of Sardinia. Hotel boat transfers are available upon request for an extra charge. Public boat transfers are available only from Corsica with scheduled timetables.

name: Maranatha Porto Vecchio
description: A short distance from motor boating, fishing, and more, this pet-friendly villa lets you experience it all. With convenient onsite parking, you'll be ready to make the 11-minute drive to Santa Giulia Beach or the 10-minute drive to Palombaggia Beach. Spend a day at the nearby beach, relax by the communal pool, or sip a drink in the garden of this 700-sq-ft villa, which also features outdoor furniture. As for the great indoors, you can come inside and enjoy the WiFi and TV. This 2-bedroom, 2-bathroom rental features a BBQ grill, air conditioning, concierge services, and local meal delivery service. Bathroom amenities include a hair dryer, towels, and toilet paper. Prepare a home-cooked meal in the kitchen, complete with an oven, a stovetop, and a refrigerator, as well as a coffee maker, an electric kettle, and a microwave. And thanks to the washer and dryer, you'll even be able to travel light.VRBO

name: Le Golfe
description: This 5-star Hotel is situated a short walk from the beach in Porto Pollo, south-west Corsica. All guest rooms have a terrace overlooking the sea and Valinco Bay and there is a heated swimming pool on site. Each of Le Golfe’s rooms also has air-conditioning, TV and free internet access. The Le Golfe's restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and offers Mediterranean cuisine made with local ingredients, a fresh fish of the day dish, Corsican specialties and grilled meat. Guests can relax with a drink in the bar during the evenings or enjoy jet ski sessions, available at an additional cost. Le Golfe is located a 1-hour’s drive from Ajaccio and 17 km from Propriano. Guests can enjoy water sports at the nearby beaches and hiking in the surrounding countryside.

name: Les Regalia Hotel & Spa
description: Set in Sainte-Lucie de Porto-Vecchio, 600 metres from Plage de Pinarellu, Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The accommodation features a concierge service, a tour desk and luggage storage for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa provides certain units with sea views, and each room has a balcony. At the accommodation all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available every morning, and includes buffet, à la carte and continental options. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the bar. Plage de Villata is 2.9 km from Les Regalia Hôtel & Spa, while Porto Vecchio Port is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 37 km from the hotel.

name: Hôtel Ideal
address: Place de la Marine, 20150 Porto, Corsica
description: Located in Porto, Hôtel Ideal offers a swimming pool and air-conditioned rooms with views of the sea or mountains. Guest rooms at Hôtel ideal are bright and feature a flat-screen TV. Each has an en suite bathroom with a shower and hairdryer. All rooms are serviced by an elevator and some have a balcony. Many shops and restaurants can be found within a 10-minute walk. Guests of Hôtel Ideal benefit from reduced rates for boat excursions around the UNESCO heritage site of Scandola Nature Reserve, the Calanques de Piana and Girolata village. The hotel is situated opposite The Genoese Tower and 300 metres from Porto Harbour, where boat trips are available to the Les Calanques de Piana. Public parking is available nearby for an additional charge.

name: Hotel Costa Rossa
address: Route de la Marine, 20150 Porto, Corsica
description: Costa Rossa is 700 metres from Porto Beach and 300 metres from Marine de Porto town centre. On a lower terrace, it offers an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by a eucalyptus forest. Rooms at Costa Rossa are contemporary in style and have a private balcony with views of the sea, river or forest. Each is decorated in neutral tones and the studios feature a kitchenette to make small meals. Every morning, guests can enjoy a continental breakfast in the breakfast room or on the terrace. The terrace also provides a nice spot to relax with a drink and admire the sea view. Additional facilities include 2 lifts and luggage storage in reception. Piana creeks are just 10 km from the residence and 8 private parking spaces are free on site.

name: Domaine Santa Giulia Palace
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a refrigerator and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Le San Lorenzo
address: Casetta Bianca Route de Palombaggia, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: With a view of Porto Vecchio and the sea, this 4-star hotel features an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and a restaurant that proposes Corsican specialties. Palombaggia beach is 4 km away. Provided with free Wi-Fi, each room at Le San Lorenzo has a private balcony opening onto the sea and is equipped with air conditioning, LCD TV and minibar. The bathroom is fitted with free toiletries, slippers, bathrobe and hairdryer. Breakfast and other meals can be requested at the reception. You are invited to have a swim in the pool or simply relax on the terrace. Water sports can be done 5 km away and Lezza Golf Club s 8 km away. Porto Vecchio is 6 km away and Figari Sud Corse Airport is a 30-minute drive from the property.

name: Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle
description: Situated in Bonifacio, Hôtel & Spa Version Maquis Citadelle boasts air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel has a year-round outdoor infinity pool, a spa and fitness centre, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant. Free private parking is available on site. Each room features a private terrace with a view. The rooms are equipped with an extra large double bed, a coffee machine, a flat-screen satellite TV, a minibar and a safety deposit box. The private bathrooms have a shower, free essential oils toiletries and a hair dryer. A buffet breakfast is available every day and features local produce and Corsican recipes. Bike hire is available at this hotel and the area is popular for golfing. The hotel also offers car hire. The King Aragon Steps down to the beach are 1.6 km from the property while Spérone Golf Course is 7 km away. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 24 km from the property. for any reservation of more than 3 rooms special conditions are applicable

name: Hotel Riva Beach
description: No description found

name: Hotel L'Acquale
description: This 4-star hotel is located in the town centre of Calvi and offers a heated outdoor swimming pool. The hotel is 500 metres from the port and 800 metres from the white sandy beach. The spacious guest rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a minibar. All rooms feature a balcony with a view. Each guest room has a private bathroom with a hairdryer. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Hotel L'Acquale features a lounge bar. A continental breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also order breakfast à la carte. Free, secure, covered parking garage is available on site. The property is 7 km from Calvi Sainte-Catherine Airport.

name: Chambres d'Hôtes Bianca Casa
description: Located just a 5-minute drive from the centre of Porto-Vecchio, Chambres d'Hôtes Bianca Casa offers B&B accommodation set within a 3-hectare property. You can enjoy the 2 outdoor swimming pools and admire the sea views from the furnished terrace. All of the rooms at Chambres d'Hôtes Bianca Casa are elegantly decorated and feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and air conditioning. Each room has a private bathroom with a shower and free toiletries. Breakfast is served each morning in the dining room. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas. Free private parking is possible on site and Palombaggia Beach is a 5-minute drive away. Figari Sud-Corse Airport is a 20-minute drive from the B&B. Laurence and her team are pleased to welcome you from 3 p.m; the reception is closed before this time.

name: Résidence Les Pavillons du Golfe
description: Set in a 6-hectare park, Résidence Les Pavillons du Golfe is located in Favone, 200 metres from Favone Beach, 28 km from Porto-Vecchio and 11 km from Solenzara. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, a garden and free WiFi access. Mobile homes and bungalows include air conditioning, a terrace with garden views and a private bathroom with a shower. A kitchenette with a microwave oven, a stovetop and a refrigerator is available in each accommodation type. Free public parking is available on site.

name: Résidence Marina Bianca
description: Residence Marina Bianca, set on the sandy beaches provides furnished air-conditioned apartments with a terrace or a loggia. There is a swimming pool, a fitness room, and a park on site. Free WiFi access is provided in each apartment. Each Marina Bianca studio and apartment has a private bathroom, TV and kitchenette equipped with hot plates, refrigerator and microwave. Guests are invited to explore the Marina Bianca’s tree and flower filled park. The swimming pool has a wading pool area for children. Residence Marina Bianca is conveniently located 20 km from the Bastia Airport and 40 km from the Port of Bastia. The residence is situated at the foot of the Castagniccia, making it easy to explore the traditional villages in the hills. Guests who arrive by car have access to free private parking.

name: Les Hameaux de Bocca del Oro
address: Route de Palombaggia - Bocca Del Oro, 20137 Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Located just a 10-minute drive from Porto-Vecchio, Résidence les Hameaux de Bocca del Oro offers an outdoor swimming pool, tennis court and a park. The beach is just 4 km away. All villas feature a balcony or terrace, BBQ facilities, a living area with a flat-screen TV, ironing facilities and a bathroom. The kitchen includes a washing machine, dishwasher and oven. Supermarkets and restaurants can be found within 1 km of the property and Figari Airport is ideally located 25 km away. Additional features include free Wi-Fi in the public areas and free private parking on site.

name: Résidence Omigna
description: Boasting a seasonal outdoor pool, Résidence Omigna in Cargèse features accommodation with free WiFi and free private parking for guests who drive. The aparthotel provides guests with a terrace, sea views, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher and an oven, and a private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A microwave, a toaster and fridge are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Résidence Omigna offers 5-star accommodation with a fitness room. A a baby safety gate is also available at the accommodation, while guests can also relax in the garden. Pero is less than 1 km from Résidence Omigna, while Port Cove is 2.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Ajaccio Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 51 km from the aparthotel.

name: Hotel Minera
description: Featuring free WiFi and a spa & wellness centre, Hotel Minera offers accommodation in L’Île-Rousse. With a garden, the property also has a terrace, as well as a bar. The property provides sea views and an outdoor pool. At the hotel, rooms have a desk and a flat-screen TV. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, and some rooms include a terrace. At Hotel Minera, every room includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hair dryer. Some rooms have a private pool. The spa includes a hammam and massages are available at an extra cost. The property is 2.8 km from L'Ile-Rousse Port and 3.3 km from Pietra Lighthouse. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 19 km from the property.

name: Hôtel-Restaurant Marina Di Lava - Grand Ajaccio
description: Marina Di Lava is a hotel located on the beach in Appietto. The property features a restaurant and bar with a terrace overlooking the sea. The accommodation provide free WiFi access in all rooms, in addition to free public parking. Renovated in 2019, all air-conditioned rooms have a private terrace and a flat-screen TV. Every room is fitted with a private bathroom complete with a hairdryer and free toiletries. A buffet breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. The restaurant serves Mediterranean specialities including sea food, pizzas, meat dishes and salad. Guests can try out many water sports on the beach, including wind surfing, canoeing and jet skiing. Ajaccio is 22 km from Marina Di Lava, while Porto Ota is 75 km away. The nearest airport is Ajaccio – Napoléon Bonaparte Airport, 23 km from the property.

name: Les Bergeries De Palombaggia
description: Situated on Corsica’s southern coast in Porto-Vecchio, The Bergeries de Palombaggia offers both idyllic beaches and spectacular mountain scenery. It features stylish accommodation and a heated swimming pool. All the suites at Les Bergeries have private patios. Free Wi-Fi and room service is also available. The Bergeries de Palombaggia restaurant serves regional cuisine on the terrace, overlooking the Cerbicales islands. Guests can relax in the outdoor pool or enjoy private access to the Palombaggia beach, located just 700m away. A shuttle service is also available and towels are provided. The hotel is ideally located for exploring the region. Guided tours of Porto-Vecchio, L’Ospedale forest and the Solenzara river can be organized from the hotel. Free parking is available on-site.

name: Hotel Le Ruesco
address: Capicciollo, Route De Porto Pollo, 20113 Olmeto, Corsica
description: Le Ruesco is situated on the northern side of the Valinco Gulf. It is located in a wooded and floral park, just 50 metres from the beach. The hotel’s outdoor swimming pool and sun terrace make it an excellent base for a relaxing break. A lounge area is available beside the pool. The hotel is composed of 25 spacious and comfortable rooms with a terrace and a clear view of the sea. All rooms have direct-dial telephone, flat-screen TV, air-conditioning and a bathroom with a shower. A buffet breakfast is available each morning. A bar service is available from 11:00 to 17:00. As a vehicle is necessary to access the residence, a private car park is available on site. The hotel also offers direct access to the beach.

name: Residenza l 'Alivetu
description: Located on the hillside between Cargèse and the beach, this residence features an outdoor swimming pool with sea views. Residenza l’Alivetu is just a 25-minute drive from the Piana Calanches hills. All apartments offer views of the sea or garden, some include a private balcony, while others include a garden. They are complete with private bathroom and shower and a fully equipped kitchenette. Outside seating is provided in all apartments allowing opportunity for al fresco dining. There is also a shared BBQ at the residence and apartments for disabled guests are available. Residenza l’Alivetu has a partner restaurant located in the centre of the village 3 km away, where guests benefit from discounted prices for half-board and full-board rates. The residence is situated just 400 metres from Alivetu of Menasina beach. Cargèse centre is a 5-minute drive away and free private parking is available on site.

name: Maison d' Hôtes L'Aria Mezzana
description: Maison d' Hôtes L'Aria Mezzana has pool views, free WiFi and free private parking, set in Sainte-Lucie de Porto-Vecchio, 19 km from Porto Vecchio Port. Offering a terrace, every unit is air conditioned and offers a dining area and a seating area with a satellite flat-screen TV. There is a fully equipped private bathroom with walk-in shower and a hair dryer. A continental breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Maison d' Hôtes L'Aria Mezzana offers a picnic area. Guests can swim in the outdoor swimming pool, go walking tours or relax in the garden. Bonifacio Port is 44 km from the accommodation, while Former Chapel of the Trinity is 47 km from the property. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 38 km from Maison d' Hôtes L'Aria Mezzana.

name: Résidence Aigue Marine
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and an electric kettle.Expedia

name: Les Suites d'Agosta
address: Lotissement de la Pinède, 20166 Porticcio, Corsica
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a rainfall showerhead, as well as a refrigerator and free WiFi. Other amenities include premium bedding, laundry facilities, towels, and rollaway beds.Expedia

name: Domaine Les Oliviers de Palombaggia
address: Route De Palombaggia - Bp 114, Porto-Vecchio, Corsica
description: Offering an outdoor pool and outdoor hot tub, Domaine Les Oliviers de Palombaggia is situated in Porto-Vecchio. Palombaggia Beach is 2.1 km from the property. Free WiFi is offered throughout the property. All units are air conditioned and include a seating area with a flat-screen TV, and Wifi. There is also a kitchen in some of the units, fitted with a dishwasher, an oven, and a microwave. All units have a private furnished terrace with a plancha grill. Free private parking is also available on site. Domaine Les Oliviers de Palombaggia also includes a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy a drink at the on-site bar. Massages using local products are available on site upon request and for an extra charge. Free use of bicycles is available at the property and the area is popular for cycling and hiking. The nearest airport is Figari-Sud Corse Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Hotel Calavita Rooftop & Spa
description: Hôtel Calavita Rooftop & Spa is located a few steps from the coast, in northern Corsica. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms, with a private bathroom, TV and free WiFi internet. The restaurant serves refined regional cuisine, seafood specialties and a wide selection of wines, in the hotel’s elegant dining room. Breakfast is available in the mornings. Central Bastia and the Marina is situated a 5-minute drive from Hôtel Calavita Rooftop & Spa and the airport is just 20 minutes away.

name: Hotel Shegara
description: Located on the southern coast of Corsica, Hotel Shegara is located on the road leading to Porte de Plaisance and a 5-minute walk from Porto-Vecchio town centre. It features a heated infinity swimming pool with sundecks and panoramic views of the bay. The Shegara Hotel offers air-conditioned rooms with a private balcony that overlooks the floral garden or the Porto-Vecchio Bay. Each room is equipped with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and an en suite bathroom. A breakfast buffet consisting of pastries, cheese, eggs, fruit salad, fresh fruit, local cold meats, hot drinks, apple juice and orange juice is served daily on the Shegara’s terrace, which offers sea views. Guests can also relax with a drink in the bar. Hotel Shegara provides free private parking and a 24-hour reception. It is just a 20-minute drive from the San Benedettu Tower and the beaches of Bonifacio. Figari Sud-Corse Airport is 25 km away.

name: Chambre Élégante Lisa
address: 792 Route Inférieure de Cardo, 20200 Bastia, Corsica
description: Featuring air-conditioned accommodation with a pool with a view, sea view and a terrace, Chambre Élégante Lisa is set in Bastia. This property offers access to a balcony and free private parking. With free WiFi, this bed and breakfast offers a satellite flat-screen TV, a washing machine and a kitchen with a microwave and fridge. Towels and bed linen are featured in the bed and breakfast. Guests can also relax in the garden. Saint Joseph Beach is 1.8 km from the bed and breakfast, while Bastia Port is 5.1 km away. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 21 km from Chambre Élégante Lisa.

name: Casa Paradisu
description: Situated in LʼÎle-Rousse, 1.1 km from Caruchettu Beach, Casa Paradisu features accommodation with a seasonal outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a restaurant. With free WiFi, this 5-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Guests can make use of a bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Casa Paradisu provides some rooms with sea views, and rooms include a kettle. The rooms have a wardrobe. An American breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Napoleon Beach is 1.7 km from Casa Paradisu, while Nautique Beach is 2.4 km from the property. The nearest airport is Calvi – Sainte-Catherine Airport, 23 km from the hotel.

name: Bagheera Village Naturiste
description: BAGHEERA Village Naturiste in Linguizzetta is a naturist family resort which features a garden and a shared lounge. Boasting a kids' club, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. All rooms are equipped with a terrace. At the resort, rooms are equipped with a wardrobe. The private bathroom is equipped with a shower. All units will provide guests with a microwave. A continental breakfast is available daily at BAGHEERA Village Naturiste. The accommodation offers 3-star accommodation with a sauna and children's playground. Guests can take part in various activities in the surroundings, including windsurfing and fishing. Corte is 33 km from BAGHEERA Village Naturiste, while Borgo is 41 km from the property. The nearest airport is Bastia - Poretta Airport, 37 km from the resort.

name: Auberge Sant'Antone
address: Place de l'Eglise - Route de Monticello, 20220 Santa-Reparata-di-Balagna, Corsica
description: L'Auberge Sant'Antone is located in Santa-Reparata-di-Balagna, just 6 km from l’Île-Rousse. It offers an outdoor swimming pool, sea views and an on-site restaurant. The rooms at L'Auberge Sant'Antone feature views of the sea or mountains and a flat-screen TV. Each one is also complete with an en suite bathroom, while some also include free Wi-Fi access. A continental breakfast, regional-style meals and Corsican cuisine is available in the restaurant. Where possible, meals are made using homegrown produce or local ingredients. The property also has a bar. Free public parking is available on site and local beaches are just a 5-minute drive away. Other local attractions include the town of Calvi, which is 25 km from the property.

name: Hotel Restaurant Mariosa
description: Mariosa is located on the sea front 6 km from the centre of Porto-Vecchio. It offers a 24-hour front desk, a heated outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with sunbeds. Free WiFi is provided. Renovated in November 2017, all the air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a private bathroom with a bath, bathrobes and free toiletries. Some rooms offer a terrace and mountain or sea views. A buffet breakfast with hot and cold drinks and sweet and savoury options is served every morning at Mariosa and can also be served in the comfort of your room upon advanced reservation. Light salad meals made of local produce are served for lunch and dinner options include meat and fish cooked on the grill and other seasonal dishes. Some rooms at Mariosa are suitable for guests with reduced mobility. Babysitting services can be arranged at an extra cost and free private parking is available. Bonifacio is 20 km away.

name: Résidence Ochji di Mare
description: Facing the marina and 800 metres from Propriano beach, this residence has air-conditioned, self-catering apartments for 4 people, overlooking the Golfe du Valinco. It offers a garden to relax in and free parking. Each apartment includes a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. You can prepare meals in the fully-equipped kitchen and enjoy them on your balcony featuring sea views. Bed linen, towels and cleaning are included. The restaurant at Résidence Ochi di Mare serves sea food and local dishes on its shaded terrace. The local area surrounding the residence offers activities including tennis, hiking and fishing. The residence is 10 minutes by car from the town centre, where you will find shops and restaurants. It is 5 minutes’ drive from the ferry harbour and 7 minutes’ drive from Propriano Airport. Please note that we have a charging station for electric vehicles.

name: Hôtel Les Terrasses D'Eze
address: 1138 Route De La Turbie, 06360 Eze, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Offering a panoramic sea view and a seasonal infinity swimming pool, Les Terrasses d'Eze - Hôtel & Spa is set in the hills of Èze, 14 km from Nice and 9 km from Monaco. Among the various facilities of this property are a garden and a terrace. The restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Offering a terrace, all air-conditioned rooms are fitted with a flat-screen satellite TV, a kettle, a bath, free toiletries and a desk. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The daily breakfast offers continental and buffet options. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the lounge bar. The on-site paid spa offers treatments including massages, wraps and a floating room (reservation is needed). A fitness centre and a pétanque court are available at an extra cost. Staff are available to help at the 24-hour front desk. Some family rooms are accessible to people with reduced mobility (only on request and subject to availability) The nearest airport is Nice Côte d'Azur Airport, 20 km from Les Terrasses d'Eze - Hôtel & Spa.

name: Mercure Villeneuve Loubet Plage
description: The Mercure Villeneuve Loubet Plage offers you a unique location in the heart of the Côte d'Azur. It has 45 rooms and is located in the prestigious Marina Baie des Anges district between Nice, Antibes and Cannes. Be elevated on our terrace, around the pool, to admire the panoramic sea view. Land directly with your feet in the water in a Californian atmosphere under the palm trees.accorhotels.com

name: Holiday Inn Cannes
address: 65 Avenue Docteur Raymond Picaud, 06150 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Renovated in 2022, this hotel faces the sea and is located 50 metres from the South Beach in Cannes. It offers free access to the outdoor swimming pool and tennis court, and guest rooms have a panoramic sea view. Each room at Luxotel Cannes is air-conditioned and equipped with a flat-screen TV and satellite channels. Some rooms also have a private terrace or balcony. Guests can enjoy innovative, Mediterranean cuisine at La Palma restaurant. It has an outdoor terrace that overlooks the shaded garden and the Mediterranean Sea. Sunbeds around the pool are available free of charge, and free pool towels are also available from reception. The Palais des Festivals and the Boulevard de la Croisette are just a 5-minute bus ride from the hotel. Cannes Mandelieu Airport is 3.5 km away.

name: Chateau De La Chevre D Or
description: Set in the heart of Eze, this luxury hotel offers spectacular views of Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat. The five-star facilities include private gardens, outdoor heated pool, wellness centre and air-conditioned accommodation with spa bath. All of the soundproofed rooms and suites are decorated with elegant furniture. They are equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Guests can choose from four different restaurants, each with a panoramic sea view, serving different types of cuisine. Mediterranean specialities are served in 1 restaurant, while the Café du Jardin offers light lunches. The Bar du Chateau, has a castle-style decor with marble columns and a large fireplace. It features all kinds of spirits, vintage brandies and champagne. Guests have access to Eze tennis club and the wellness centre. It includes a fitness room, overlooking the sea. Massages are also possible on request. Free Wi-Fi access is provided in the entire hotel, and the 24-hour reception can organise the valet service.

name: Novotel Monte-Carlo
description: Our Novotel Monte-Carlo terraces, gardens and Riviera-inspired decor will immerse you in a relaxed atmosphere as soon as you arrive in Monaco. We have everything you need for a rejuvenating stay. Order detox juices by day and cocktails by night at our Azzurra Kitchen restaurant offering dishes full of Mediterranean flavor. Need to work? Use one of our 12 meeting rooms or our Wojo coworking space.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Metropole, Monte Carlo
description: The Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo offers a guest experience marked by luxury, serenity and gastronomy. This magnificent five-star hotel perfectly embodies the glamour of yesteryear and the modern elegance of Monte-Carlo; as well as being located in a unique location in the Carré d’Or, just a few steps from the Casino. Hotel Metropole Monte-Carlo features 4 restaurants. Les Ambassadeurs by Christophe Cussac offers a gourmet contemporary Mediterranean cuisine. Yoshi, the only Japanese restaurant on the Côte d'Azur to be awarded a Michelin star since 2010, showcases typically Japanese cuisine. The Odyssey restaurant where you can enjoy lunch by the pool, was designed by Karl Lagerfeld and the Lobby Bar with its terrace, trendy and elegant, proposes delightful gourmet moments all day long… Covered throughout the winter and al fresco during the rest of the year, the Odyssey pool is an oasis of relaxation and well-being nestled in the heart of Monte-Carlo. The Spa Metropole by Givenchy, designed by architect Didier Gomez, reflects the refinement and modernity of the House, to the finest detail. Beauty, well-being, relaxation: each treatment ritual is a ‘haute couture’ experience. With private parking on site, the hotel is 2 km from the Monte-Carlo Golf Club and Nice Côte-d’Azur Airport is 30 km away.

name: Best Western Premier Montfleuri
description: The Best Western Premier Montfleuri is situated just a stone’s throw away from the town center of Sainte-Maxime and close to the beaches, art galleries and Parc des Myrtes. The Best Western Premier Montfleuri is surrounded by numerous golf courses and has centuries of old villages. With its discrete charm and modern construction, you can relax and take advantage of a garden and a nice swimming pool. The bar, the living rooms and the dining room will welcome you with a decor of warm, inviting shades. The bedrooms are decorated in a provincial style. Most of them offer a balcony looking at the Gulf of Saint-Tropez. Our restaurant and its large terrace will propose to you a fresh cuisine based on regional flavors. For an enjoyable stay in Sainte-Maxime France, go online and book a room today. For any prepayment required, the hotel will send you by email a 3D Secure link.bestwestern.com

name: Canopy by Hilton Cannes
description: Overlooking the harbor and sandy beaches, we are just a five-minute walk from La Croisette, the world-famous Palais des Festivals and the main shopping streets. The art district is just around the corner and we’re only five minutes from the Musée des Explorations du Monde, the Tour Carrée and the church. Take in beautiful views of the city from our rooftop restaurant and bar.Hilton

name: JW Marriott Cannes
address: 50 Boulevard de la Croisette, BP 224, 06414 Cannes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: Pamper yourself with a sophisticated retreat on France's famed Cote d'Azur. Stylishly appointed and ideally situated, the JW Marriott Cannes provides a 5-star hotel experience with a perfect location on La Croisette, the legendary oceanfront avenue with luxury shopping and delightful restaurants. Our luxury beachfront hotel also boasts a short distance to the Palais des Festivals, Nice airport and Cannes' most popular local attractions. Relax in spacious hotel accommodations with plush bedding, sleek bathrooms, Wi-Fi access and floor-to-ceiling windows. Or, enjoy working out in our fully-equipped fitness center or swimming in our outdoor pool. Make sure to relax with a cocktail in our rooftop bar or plan an unforgettable evening of fine dining in our Italian restaurant Scalini. If visiting for business, take advantage of our hotel's 18 modern event venues for inspiring meetings and large-scale conferences. The JW Marriott Cannes wants to make your next vacation on the French Riviera flawless.Marriott

name: Columbus Hotel Monte-Carlo, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Located in the heart of Fontvieille, across from the Princess Grace Rose Garden, with views out to the Mediterranean Sea the hotel is both central and secluded. The Prince’s Palace of Monaco and the Louis II Stadium are within one kilometer. The Oceanographic Museum of Monaco is 10 minutes away. Our savvy guests can enjoy a meal in our Mediterranean restaurant Tavolo or relax in our informal and sophisticated bar. We also have a 24-hour fitness center and a seasonal outdoor pool.Hilton

name: Hotel Royal Riviera
description: Located on the peninsula of Cap-Ferrat and offering panoramic views of Provençal gardens and the Mediterranean, this five-star 96-room hotel provides the intimacy of a private villa with the luxury and glamour of a palace. Guests have free access to the seasonal beach from mid-May to the end of September and to the heated pool, sauna, hammam and fitness room. Each air-conditioned room has a private bathroom stocked with free toiletries. Some rooms offer sea and garden views. The Hotel Royal-Riviera Hotel has a gourmet restaurant 'La Table du Royal' with a terrace and panoramic view of the sea. The poolside bar and restaurant 'Jasmin Grill & Lounge', open for lunch all year round, offers a view of Kerylos Villa. Free WiFi access and valet service are available on site. Hotel Royal-Riviera is just 15 minutes from Monaco and Nice and 30 minutes from Nice International Airport. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Fairmont Monte-Carlo
description: Set in the heart of the Principality of Monaco, overlooking the Mediterranean and with splendid views of the Riviera, the Fairmont Monte Carlo invites you to enjoy a unique stay in one of the world's most glamorous destinations. Located close to the legendary Monte Carlo Casino and the elegant Carré d'Or shopping district, the hotel provides unparalleled experiences, including a prime view of the most famous bend in the F1 circuit, the Fairmont Hairpin. A kids club is available in July and August.accorhotels.com

name: Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa
address: 770 Chemin des Moyennes Breguieres, 06600 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: The Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa is a 12-minute drive from the center of Antibes, in the heart of the Côte d'Azur. It offers views of the Baie des Anges and the Southern Alps. Decorated in a modern style, all air-conditioned rooms feature flat-screen TVs and telephones. Private bathrooms feature bath or shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. The hotel's restaurant, L'Angelus, serves traditional cuisine and buffet breakfast at an additional cost. Breakfast is free for children under 12. Guests can enjoy the indoor spa, which includes a heated seawater pool, whirlpool, sauna, hammam, fitness room, relaxation area and outdoor seawater pools, one of which is heated at certain times of the year. The hotel specializes in Thalassotherapy, offering seawater treatments and massages. The property features a 24-hour reception and private parking. A shuttle service to and from Antibes train station, 3.8 km from the property, is also available at an additional cost and upon reservation. The Picasso Museum is a 15-minute drive away. The Biot golf course is a 7-minute drive away. Nice Côte d'Azur airport is 14 km from Thalazur Antibes - Hôtel & Spa.

name: Hotel Brin d'Azur - Saint Tropez
address: RD 98 Route de Saint Tropez, 83580 Gassin, Var
description: Offering direct access to the beach, this 3-star hotel is located in Gassin. Guests can relax on the furnished terrace, by the outdoor swimming pool, just 1.5 km from Saint-Tropez. All the air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Brin d'Azur - Saint Tropez are soundproofed and feature a desk and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Each room also includes a private bathroom with a bath and free toiletries. At Hotel Brin d'Azur - Saint Tropez, a buffet breakfast is served every morning in the communal lounge. Free private parking is possible on site and Port-Grimaud is 7 km from the hotel.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Le Catalogne
description: Hotel Le Catalogne is ideally situated between Cannes and St Tropez in the seaside of St Aygulf and surrounded by a park of 4000 mÂ² at 100 metres from the sea and rocky creeks. The rooms are comfortable and air-conditioned with bathroom, toilet, telephone, satellite television and safety box. Tea and coffee making facilities are available. For your comfort, the Hotel Le Catalogne provides a heated swimming pool with deckchairs and parasols, a overshadowed terrace, a private car park and a Wifi internet access.

name: Van der Valk Hotel Saint Aygulf
description: This seafront hotel is ideally situated midway between Cannes and Saint-Tropez. It offers a warm welcome, comfortable accommodation, and a spectacular view of the bay of Saint-Raphaël and Esterel Massif. The Van der Valk Hotel Saint-Aygulf features 85 rooms and suites. They are all en suite, and present cosy and elegant spaces. Most have a terrace featuring a view of the Mediterranean Sea or the lake, home to flamingos and swans. There are also 2 villas that boast a private pool. The restaurant serves traditional French cuisine for lunch and dinner in a modern and stylish setting. It offers a spectacular view of the Mediterranean Sea. The bar boasts a cosy setting where you can enjoy a relaxing drink, or mingle and socialise. It features a pool table, table football, a TV, a piano and Wi-Fi access.

name: Best Western PLUS La Corniche
description: The hotel has received the European Eco-label certification. The label distinguishes services and products that meet high standards of both performance and environmental quality. Bathed in sunlight and opening out onto the azure sky, the Best Western Plus Hotel La Corniche overlooks the Toulon Bay, a few steps away from the most beautiful beaches of the coast and very close to the mythical village of St Tropez. Opposite the building, the small St Louis fishing port is alive with the work of the fishermen. An invitation to the Mediterranean Douceur de Vivre. The double bedrooms, twin rooms or junior suites, are decorated in the warm hues of Provencal style and are equipped with a 4 star hotel comfort. The wide view of the St. Mandrier Peninsula and Porquerolles Island offers an enthralling sight. Enjoy your stay.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Juana
description: Listed as a historic monument, this 5-star hotel is located in Juan-les-Pins, 260 metres from Belles Rives Beach. It features an outdoor swimming pool with solarium, a fitness centre and a sauna. A flat-screen TV, minibar and free WiFi access are just some of the facilities in the air-conditioned rooms. The marble bathrooms include a bathtub and Asprey's toiletries. The balconies offer views of the Mediterranean and the pine grove, and some rooms have views of Juan les Pins. Traditional French cuisine is served at the Bistrot Terrasse restaurant, which is decorated with chandeliers and features local products. Meals can be served on the terrace, under the pine trees, or in the indoor dining area. Guests can enjoy a cocktail in the bar at Hôtel Juana. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Juana Hotel is a 20-minute drive down the coast to Cannes - Mandelieu Airport and an airport shuttle is available upon request and at an additional cost. Private parking and a 24-hour valet service are available on site. A charging station for electric cars is available at this property.

name: Cannes Villa St Barth
description: Located a 5-minute drive from the centre of Cannes in 2000m² of tropical gardens, this guest accommodation features an infinity pool, a hammam and a hot tub. It offers rooms with a teak deck patio and free Wi-Fi. There is a spa and wellness centre. Guest rooms at the Villa St Barth are equipped with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a DVD player. Each private bathroom has locally made bathrobes. Breakfast is served throughout the day and tapas is also prepared upon request. Additionally Asian and Mediterranean dishes are available at the restaurant. Cannes Villa St Barth is less than a 5-minute drive from the Boulevard de la Croisette. A bus stop can be found opposite the property. Private parking is available on site, and guests can enjoy views of the Lérins Islands from the property's wooden terraces.

name: Kube Saint-Tropez
description: Kube Hotel St Tropez is perfectly located for both business and leisure guests in Saint-Tropez. The hotel has everything you need for a comfortable stay. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Kube Hotel St Tropez. Television LCD/plasma screen, slippers, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms can be found in selected guestrooms. The hotel's peaceful atmosphere extends to its recreational facilities which include fitness center, golf course (within 3 km), outdoor pool, garden. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Kube Hotel St Tropez.Agoda

name: The 1932 Hotel & Spa Cap d'Antibes - MGallery.
description: Built in 1932, the legendary French Riviera Hotel and Spa in Cap d'Antibes is reconnecting with its history after a complete renovation combining Art Deco and modern elegance. This pairing creates a unique identity in our spacious rooms, inviting you on a journey back in time. Our rooftop has a pool, restaurant + bar to enjoy all day. Panoramic view of the Med.accorhotels.com

name: Hôtel Martinez Cannes
description: Located on the famous La Croisette Boulevard in Cannes, Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt is a 5-star hotel featuring a private beach, which is accessible for an extra charge. Guests can enjoy a meal in one of the onsite restaurants or a drink at the Martinez bar. Entirely renovated in May 2018, guest rooms at Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt are decorated in a contemporary Art Deco style and feature a seating area. Each air-conditioned room features a marble bathroom and some have a private terrace with views of the Mediterranean Sea. Opened in May 2018, the restaurant Le Jardin du Martinez offers seating on a terrace in the shade of palm and cypress trees, and in fine weather guests can enjoy the 1930's themed garden parties hosted at the restaurant. Guests seeking a fine dining experience are invited to dine at the 2 Michelin star La Palme d'Or restaurant, which specialises in cuisine inspired by cinema and offers a view of the Croisette. Located on the beach, the La Plage du Martinez restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine with local produce and fresh seafood. The Martinez Bar celebrates the history of the Hotel Martinez and proposes a range of cocktails and gin and tonics, in addition to a nightly live culinary show on the Teppan plancha grill. Spa services such as massages, body treatments and facials are available and guests can exercise in the fitness centre. Hotel Martinez - in the Unbound Collection by Hyatt offers direct access onto the beach and is within walking distance of the shopping area. With a secure private car park, the hotel also offers valet parking. Nice-Cote-d’Azur Airport is 20 km away.

name: Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes
description: Offering views of the Mediterranean Sea, Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes is located on the famous Boulevard La Croisette in Cannes, 110 meters from the Palais des Festivals and the old port. It has a heated outdoor swimming pool, a spa and a private beach. Guests have free access to the wellness area and the 24-hour gym. The Hotel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes offers air-conditioned, soundproofed rooms and suites, LCD satellite TV, free Wi-Fi and private bathroom. Most have sea views. During your stay at Hôtel Barrière Le Majestic Cannes, you can enjoy massages and relaxation therapies at the hotel spa, Spa Diane Barrière, which uses Biologique Recherche products. You can also relax on the hotel terrace or on the private beach, deck chairs can be rented on site. The hotel has 3 restaurants: The traditional French brasserie, Fouquet's, serves a menu created in collaboration with the three-star chef Pierre Gagnaire. Paradiso Nicole & Pierre serves Italian cuisine with a Mediterranean influence. The BFire by Mauro Colagreco restaurant is located on the private beach. The hotel offers a children's club, Le Studio by Petit VIP, free for children from 4 to 12 years old. The hotel is located just a minute's walk from the beach, 400 meters from Cannes train station and 27 km from Nice airport. Secure private parking is also available at an additional cost. Charging stations for electric cars are available on site. During private events or congresses, the beach may be closed. During this period, customers can access the establishment's partner beaches. Cannes is a dynamic city that hosts a multitude of cultural, professional and festive events throughout the year, which can cause some inconveniences due to the crowds, such as noise or large structures erected in all places, especially on the Croisette and the beach. Prior to arrival, the property encourages guests to check in advance for upcoming events. You can visit the site of the Palais des Festivals or that of the city of Cannes.

name: Residéal
address: 100 Rue Line Renaud Loulou Gasté, 06600 Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a seasonal outdoor pool and a refrigerator, as well as a stovetop and a dishwasher. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, an electric kettle, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Hôtel La Villa
address: 122 Av Du Croiseur Leger Le Malin, 83120 Sainte-Maxime, Var
description: Hôtel & Spa La Villa is located on the beachfront across the road from Garonnette Beach, an 8-minute drive from the centre of Sainte-Maxime and 150 metres from Issambres Port, where guests can take the ferry to Saint-Tropez in summer. At an extra cost and upon reservation, guests have access to a private use spa with a hot tub. It offers air-conditioned and soundproofed guestrooms and suites with free WiFi. The rooms are decorated in a Provençal style and are equipped with a minibar and satellite TV. The soundproofed apartments have a living room and some offer a view of the Mediterranean sea. For stays of 3 nights or more and upon reservation, guests have access to a private kitchenette equipped with a fridge, dishwasher and microwave for an extra fee. A sweet breakfast can be served on the terrace under the olive trees in the summer months. A savory breakfast is available at an extra cost. The on-site bar is open all day and serves a variety of drinks and ice creams. Guests can also order a light meal of local tapas-style ingredients onsite, or can eat at the onsite restaurant upon reservation. An array of activities are offered in the area, such as windsurfing, scuba diving, fishing and balneotherapy. The hotel also offers free private parking.

name: Boutique Hotel & Spa la Villa Cap Ferrat
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 22 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring refrigerators and flat-screen televisions. Your bed comes with premium bedding, and all rooms are furnished with sofa beds. Digital programming and iPod docking stations are provided for your entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Amenities Relax and unwind with massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. If you're ready for some gaming fun, you can hop on the casino shuttle (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. For a surcharge, guests may use a shuttle from the airport to the hotel (available 24 hours) and a ferry terminal shuttle. Property Location Located in Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Boutique Hôtel & Spa la Villa Cap Ferrat is near the bay, a 4-minute walk from Cros Dei Pin Beach and 7 minutes by foot from Passable Beach. This hotel is 0.4 mi (0.7 km) from Villa Ephrussi. Dining Grab a bite from the snack bar/deli, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:30 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Mandatory Charges You'll be asked to pay the following charges at the property: A tax is imposed by the city: EUR 2.01 per person, per night. This tax does not apply to children under 18 years of age. We have included all charges provided to us by the property. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately EUR 16 for adults and EUR 8 for children Airport shuttle fee: EUR 85 per vehicle (maximum occupancy 7) Self parking fee: EUR 15 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at 11:30 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Guests must contact this property in advance to reserve onsite parking This property accepts credit cards; cash is not accepted This property offers transfers from the airport and train station (surcharges may apply). To arrange pick-up, guests must contact the property 24 hours prior to arrival, using the contact information on the booking confirmation. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. For more details, please contact the property using the information on the booking confirmation. name: Grand-Hôtel Du Cap-Ferrat, A Four Seasons Hotel
address: 71 Boulevard Du Général De Gaulle, 06230 Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, Alpes-Maritimes
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a sauna and a pool, as well as a lifeguard on site and free WiFi. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, designer toiletries, premium bedding, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Hotel le Mandala
address: 63 Avenue Du Marechal Foch, 83990 Saint-Tropez, Var
description: Located in the centre of Saint-Tropez, an 8-minute walk from Place des Lices, Hotel le Mandala features a contemporary décor. It offers free WiFi access and private parking, paid for 25 eur per day per car. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar and pool access. Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen TV, views of the sea or garden and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms include a seating area where you can relax. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property during high season. You can engage in various activities, such as windsurfing and diving. Saint-Raphaël is 20 km from Hotel le Mandala, while Porquerolles is 47 km away. The nearest airport is Toulon - Hyeres Airport, 45 km from Hotel le Mandala.

name: Le Yaca Saint-Tropez
description: Located at the foot of the Citadelle and featuring the interior courtyard with the garden, Le Yaca Saint-Tropez offers hotel accommodation in Saint-Tropez. Guests can enjoy the open air swimming pool, set in a flowery garden. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV with cable channels and a DVD player. Selected units have a seating area. Rooms feature views of the sea, garden, village or pool. Each room has a private bathroom and minibar. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and slippers. Guests can enjoy the Italian gastronomic restaurant and on-site bar. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. The hotel also offers bike hire and car hire. The property is a 3-minute walk from the Place des Lices and the St Tropez port. Pampalonne beaches are a 10-minute drive. Cannes is 44 km from Le Yaca Saint-Tropez, while Saint-Raphaël is 20 km from the property. Nice Cote d'Azur airport is 100 km away.

name: Le Domaine de la Mer
description: No description found

name: Hotel Villa Maya
description: Just 200 metres from the beaches, Villa Maya is located in Gassin, only 2 km from St Tropez. Port Cogolin is a 5-minute drive away. All rooms have a terrace or balcony, and some offer views of the heated pool or St Tropez Gulf. Tea and coffee making facilities and a private bathroom are provided in each room or studio. Meals can be enjoyed in the dining room upon advance request and family-style dishes are available. Guests can dine out at the Terrasses de Saint Tropez restaurant or on site. Breakfast is prepared every morning using fresh, local produce. There is also a half-board rate available, which includes breakfast and dinner. Saint-Raphael Train Station is 35 km from Villa Maya. Shuttles to the airport and local towns can be arranged.

name: Hotel Cap Estel
description: Located on the Cap and facing the sea, Hotel Cap Estel features luxury accommodation and a private beach. Guests can enjoy the indoor and outdoor swimming pools, the garden and the wellness centre. All rooms offer free WiFi access, a terrace and panoramic views of the sea and the garden. They also feature a minibar with free soft drinks and a Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathrooms are complete with shower and/or bathtub and toilet. Breakfast is included and the hotel also offers a restaurant and a bar on site. Additional restaurants and bars can be found 2 km from the property. Massages are available upon reservation at an additional cost. Eze Village is 7 km away, Nice is 15 km away and Monaco is 7 km away. Free parking is available on site.

name: La Bastide d'Antoine
address: Domaine Du Treizain - Route De Saint-Tropez D98, 83580 Gassin, Var
description: This Provençal-style house offers panoramic views of Saint-Tropez bay. It is located just 2 km from the city centre and offers an outdoor heated swimming pool. The modern rooms at La Bastide d’Antoine are all air-conditioned and offer a flat-screen TV and garden or sea views. All have a private bathroom and some have a terrace. Breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace or in the rooms. The pool bar provides a perfect spot to relax with a drink and use the free Wi-Fi access while admiring the open fireplace. La Bastide can be found 50-minutes from Hyères Airport. A laundry service is provided and free parking is available for all guests.

name: La Villa Mauresque
address: 1792 Route De La Corniche, 83700 Saint-Raphaël, Var
description: La Villa Mauresque is a hotel located right on the seafront with far-reaching views of the Gulf of St Tropez. Guests can enjoy free access to the hotel’s swimming pool, seafront spa with hot tub, beach and boathouse with sailing equipment. Free WiFi access is provided in all guest rooms. Most of the rooms at La Villa Mauresque have a view of the sea and some have swimming pool or garden views. The bathrooms have a shower and/or spa bath. Each is equipped with a Malongo machine, a fruit bowl and free Phytomer toiletries. The hotel serves a daily breakfast, which can be taken on the private terrace, by the sea or near the pool. The on-site restaurant, Le Bougainvillier, managed by our chef, offers culinary delights using locally sourced products and best quality ingredients with fixed menus, "à la carte" dining and daily suggestions Guests can enjoy many activities thanks to its free canoes, kayaks, snorkeling material, table tennis and children's toys. Massages, beauty treatments, babysitting, fitness and yacht hire services are available.

name: Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany
address: 19 Avenue De L'Amiral Ganteaume, 13260 Cassis, Bouches-du-Rhône
description: With views of the highest cliff in Europe and over the Mediterranean Sea, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is set on the beachfront in Cassis. located 30 metres away. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property. The contemporary air-conditioned rooms at Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany are equipped a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box. Each room has a private bathroom with a bath or shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some rooms have a private terrace with a sea view. During the high season, Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany has a restaurant open in summer time for dinner only and serving tapas and traditional meals. There is a lounge bar and a sun deck facing the sea. A continental breakfast is available for an extra charge and includes pastries, fruit, meat, cheese. Hotel de La Plage - Mahogany is just a 5-minute walk from the Port of Cassis and Marseille is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Marseille Marignane, 54.5 km away. Circuit Paul Ricard is 40 minutes' drive away and Train station Gare St Charles is 32 km from the hotel. A private car park is available at a surcharge and upon availability.
